==Chinese==

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
Found as {{zh-l|*𩆜}} in ''{{w|Shuowen}}'': {{Han compound|霝|玉|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|t2=jade}}.

The semantic component {{zh-l|*玉|jade}} may be replaced with {{zh-l|*巫|witch}}, as in the current form, or with {{zh-l|*心|heart}} or {{zh-l|*示|memorial tablet}} in the ancient bronze inscription forms.
